item.title: Whatsapp Chat Data Analysis
item.description: About The Whole Idea about this analysis, is to Understand about the persons chatting behavior and finding pattern in Whatsapp Messaging In this we will be analysing the chat between two persons From the below chart we can clearly see the number of messages sent each day {"x":{"attrs":{"labels":["day","Number Of Messages"],"retainDateWindow":false,"axes":{"x":{"pixelsPerLabel":60}},"colors":["#FD7070","#FD7070"],"series":{"Number Of Messages"
